name: Battle Of The Great Lands
description:
Battle Of The Great Lands is a 2d turn based strategy game with battles that happen in real time. Build buildings and use magic to take control of rival islands. Build up your armies and use tactics to maneuver your troops to victory.

If you like strategy games and troop management you might enjoy Battle Of The Great Lands.

Battle Of The Great Lands features:
Free turn based strategy game.
5 different islands to conquer (More to come).
Main island building upgrades.
Hard mode and no magic mode for all Islands.

https://discord.gg/p46UG7BQTQ
